item.description: This is open to the group. There is a space limit. The first 20 people to RSVP to Kiki will attend. We will wrap the gifts for the twins that we're sponsoring. This is a pot luck latke & dessert party. We need latkes home made or store bought, a large salad & dressing, desserts home made or store bought & beverages. If you RSVP late you may not get to bring what you want because you'll be asigned to bring something we still need.
item.name: Hanukkah Gift Wrap Party !
